SOON: At 10AM ET, @INL’s @Dr_Mark_Peters will testify at @EnergyGOP hearing on #NELA, which would establish long-term strategy for the U.S. to maintain a leading edge in demonstration and deployment of advanced #nuclear energy technology.

Watch:  https://www.energy.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/live-webcast …
More info here:  https://www.energy.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/hearings-and-business-meetings?ID=588FE47B-C329-42B9-968F-B7B8708E32EA …

TOMORROW, April 30, at 10AM ET, @EnergyGOP will hold a hearing to consider the Nuclear Energy Leadership Act (NELA), which I have co-sponsored. @INL’s @Dr_Mark_Peters will testify. #NELA will provide long-term vision and strategy for advanced #nuclear energy research in the U.S.

I am saddened to learn of the death of Specialist Michael Osorio on his first deployment to Iraq. I offer my deepest, heartfelt condolences to his family for their loss and extend my utmost gratitude for the understated sacrifice they have made through supporting his service.

With tax liability down nearly $1,200 on average, but refund up just $43, an average of $1,156 went into paychecks during the year. That meant the average American saw an increase of about $96 per month in their paychecks.  https://www.apnews.com/Globe%20Newswire/017f64d7ae58b807f9030249e824169d …

I was saddened this week to hear of Mr. Harvey McCoy’s passing.  Harvey was a great friend to my staff and me, and he was an incredibly strong advocate for Idaho’s veterans.  He will be sorely missed by many. pic.twitter.com/SmekfjOLGL

According to @HRBlock, data through the end of March showed a 25 percent decrease in individual tax liablity. That’s great news for the American taxpayer and our economy! Straightening out your financial life?  Set a Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Realistic and Timeline (SMART) goal. Planning now can improve families' financial foundations and better enable us to address unexpected events. #FinancialLiteracyMonth  https://indeedhi.re/2UiiZei

Personal financial education helps prepare individuals to manage their money, credit and debt, and it serves as a cornerstone of consumer protection.  The Idaho Financial Literacy Coalition offers a number of financial education resources to help.  http://www.idahoflc.org/

Increased financial and economic literacy can help Americans navigate around the countless pitfalls that confront working families.  Visit the @uidaho Extension website for tips. #FinancialLiteracyMonth  http://www.extension.uidaho.edu/personalfinance

I joined @SenatorTimScott to co-sponsor a Senate Resolution designating April as #FinancialLiteracyMonth. https://www.scott.senate.gov/media-center/press-releases/sens-scott-reed-and-jones-introduce-resolution-on-financial-literacy-month …

I have met many Idahoans working in their communities to provide care and attention to victims in need of assistance.  I remain committed to ensuring victims of crime have full access to the resources they need. #NCVRW2019

#NCVRW2019 commemorates the crime victim advocates, allied professionals, and selfless volunteers who have courageously worked toward a future of accessible resources and services. This year’s theme is “Honoring Our Past. Creating Hope for the Future.”
National Crime Victims’ Rights Week began April 7. Visit @OJPOVC’s website for more information about resources and events. #NCVRW2019  http://www.ovc.gov/ncvrw2019
In 1982, President Ronald Reagan established the President’s Task Force on Victims of Crime, cementing a path for progress in the victims movement. #NCVRW2019

April is the Month of the Military Child.  Military children face separations, deployments, frequent moves and even parents’ injuries throughout their lives.  I honor and recognize the military children and families of Idaho’s @IDNationalGuard and #MHAFB gunfighters.
